metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13767 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Use after free in media picker in Google Chrome prior to 79.0.3945.88 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

notes.Note: alexmurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
